name: Wild Harvest Fruit Kabobs, 6 Count, for Pet Rabbits, Guinea Pigs, Hamsters, Gerbils, Mice and Rats
short_description: HEALTHY & TASTY TREAT: Made with real carrot, cherry and cranberry for a delicious and nutritious snack.
FOR SMALL ANIMALS: Kabobs are specially formulated for rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters, gerbils, mice and rats.
EDIBLE SKEWER: Fruit kabobs are 100% edible.
RESEALABLE: Freshness seal for easy storage.
WILD HARVEST BRAND: Offers a full assortment of nutritional and interactive products.
product_description: Wild Harvest™ bird and small animal products offer a full assortment of nutrition and interactive products for your daily bird and small animal needs. We’re committed to providing your birds and small pets with a complete diet containing the vitamins, minerals and nutrients they need for a happy, healthy life. Wild Harvest™ Fruit Kabobs are a great-tasting treat that your pet will love to eat! These 100% edible kabobs include an edible skewer, and are perfectly sized for small animals, including rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters, gerbils, mice and rats. Made with real carrot, cherry and cranberry, these nutritious and delicious treats are sure to become one of your pet’s favorite snacks. Wild Harvest Fruit Kabobs are a great way to add variety to your pet’s diet, and can be fed to your pet as a treat or special reward. The convenient resealable bag keeps the fruit kabobs fresh. Each bag contains 6 kabobs. Small animals, such as guinea pigs, hamsters and rabbits, can make great family pets. The experts at Wild Harvest brand strive to provide small pet owners with all of the tools they need to enrich and improve the lives of their furry friends.

name: Oxbow Enriched Life Apple Stick Bouquet, Rabbit & Guinea Pig Toys, Small Animal Enrichment Chew for Bunny, Hamster, Chinchilla, Natural Play Chew Toy for Habitat Variety and Cage Accessories
short_description: STIMULATES NATURAL BEHAVIORS: The Apple Stick Bouquet encourages chewing, playing, and exploring, helping rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas, hamsters, and other small pets stay active, curious, and mentally enriched every day in their cage or play area.

MULTI-TEXTURE ENRICHMENT TOY: Designed with natural apple sticks and natural fibers, this small animal bouquet provides engaging textures that inspire safe chewing, healthy play, and daily entertainment for rabbits, guinea pigs, rats, and hamsters.

VERSATILE HABITAT ACCESSORY: Perfect for cages, hutches, or playpens, this apple stick bundle adds dimension and variety to small pet habitats, creating a boredom-busting environment for bunnies, chinchillas, guinea pigs, and other small animals.

PET-SAFE NATURAL MATERIALS: Crafted from premium apple sticks and natural fibers with no artificial colors, preservatives, or harmful additives, this chew-safe accessory gives pet parents peace of mind while pets enjoy hours of long-lasting enrichment.

OXBOW QUALITY ENRICHMENT: Part of the esteemed Enriched Life line, this bouquet toy is trusted by veterinarians and pet owners worldwide to deliver safe enrichment. Ideal as a rabbit toy, guinea pig accessory, hamster chew, or chinchilla play item.
product_description: Bring variety, play, and natural activity into your pet’s daily routine with the Oxbow Enriched Life Apple Stick Bouquet. Designed to promote safe chewing and healthy engagement, this interactive toy combines durable apple sticks and woven shapes into a bouquet-inspired design that sparks curiosity and encourages natural instincts. Rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas, hamsters, and other small pets have an instinctive need to chew, play, and explore. Providing safe, engaging toys such as this bouquet helps prevent boredom, reduces stress, and promotes a more enriching environment. The playful bouquet design offers multiple textures and shapes, stimulating both mental and physical activity while encouraging natural chewing behaviors. This variety of chew points keeps pets engaged for longer, supporting enrichment and cage variety. By focusing on instinct-driven activity, the Apple Stick Bouquet encourages foraging, pulling, and interaction that adds dimension to hutches, cages, or playpens. Made from pet-safe, natural materials without artificial colors or harmful additives, the Apple Stick Bouquet provides peace of mind for pet parents while delivering hours of safe entertainment. Its compact size makes it easy to place in different areas of your pet’s enclosure, helping to create an engaging, ever-changing environment that promotes curiosity and activity. Part of the Oxbow Enriched Life product line, this toy reflects a dedication to safe, natural enrichment for small pets, trusted by veterinarians and loved by pet parents. Whether you’re seeking rabbit chew toys, guinea pig cage accessories, hamster boredom breakers, or chinchilla play items, the Apple Stick Bouquet offers a perfect combination of durability, play, and enrichment. Support your pet’s happiness and natural instincts with this bouquet-style chew toy designed to deliver long-lasting entertainment and a healthier, more engaging habitat every day.

short_description: [ Chew Toys Keep Pets Well-Being ] The teeth of rodent pets continue to grow, which affects their eating and growth. Carrot hamster toys can meet the teeth grinding needs of hamsters, lemmings, mice, tiny gerbils and other small animals, inhibit the growth of teeth, and keep them in a happy mood. Niteangel chew toys keep your adorable pet active, stress relieved and glow with energy.

[ Safe Material And Design ] Made of beech wood and paper, safe material is the best hamster decor toys for furry friends, keeping them from chewing on cages or other furniture, carrot shape design makes it better for moving and chewing, hamsters will hide it as a favourite plaything to break boredom and grinding teeth.

[ Entertaining And Easy To Chew ] Radish hamster chew toys are also a way to relieve anxiety and stress for small pets to keep them well-being and active, beech wood material allows hamsters to chew and grind their teeth better, helping them deal with the environment in a fun way, and it's cute look will definitely captivate your furry friends.

[ Build Small Animal Habitats ] Sometimes the hamsters feel anxious or stressed if they are live alone for long periods of time. You can hide the carrot small animal chew toys in various corners of the habitat, and it will slowly seek it out and move back to its house, helping them enjoy and relieve stress until you go back home.

[ Ideal Gift For Furry Friends ] Small animal chewing carrots are great for chinchillas, squirrels, hamsters, gerbils, little prairie dogs and other rodents. If your little pet has little interest in them at first, please put these chew toys in the cage and let them get used to it for a while, and they will slowly try to chew and gradually become ecstatic.

Tasty Apple And Honey Treat Sticks Your Hamsters Will Love
product_description: Vitakraft Crunch Sticks Hamster Treats in Apple and Honey Flavor give your hamster or gerbil the perfect combination of taste, activity, and enrichment. Each pack contains two oven-baked sticks that bring irresistible apple and honey flavor to your small pet’s snacking routine while supporting their natural chewing instincts. Built around a safe natural wood stick at the center, these treats encourage chewing activity that not only entertains but also keeps your pet engaged with a fun challenge. The crunchy baked layers are carefully crafted to provide long-lasting enjoyment, ensuring your hamster or gerbil gets both taste and stimulation in every bite. A simple clip holder is included so you can attach the Crunch Stick securely to the inside of your pet’s cage, making it easy for them to enjoy at their own pace. These snacks are more than just tasty treats for gerbils and hamsters. They are an important source of enrichment that helps keep small pets active and engaged in their environment. Perfect for bonding moments or simply treating your hamster or gerbil to something special, Vitakraft Crunch Sticks turn snack time into an interactive experience. By offering variety and enjoyment in their daily routine, you’re giving your small pet more than food, you’re giving them a moment of joy that will strengthen your connection. Treat them right and show them they are truly part of the family with Vitakraft Crunch Sticks Hamster Treats Apple and Honey Flavor.

name: 50-60 Pcs Rabbit Chew Toys, Guinea Pig, Hamster, Bunny Chew Toys, Sweet Bamboo, Apple Stick, Timothy Stick, Prevent Teeth Overgrowth, Clean Teeth
short_description: 【50-60 Pcs Chew Toys】50-60 pcs rabbit chew toys set includes 8 sweet bamboo, 5 timothy grass sticks, 5 flower timothy grass sticks, 3 flower timothy grass cookies, and over 30 apple sticks.

【Multiple Toys】This rabbit chews set includes sweet bamboo, timothy sticks, flower grass sticks, flower grass cookies, and apple sticks, each with its unique texture and flavor, providing a comprehensive chewing experience for rabbits. Sweet bamboo, with its natural sweetness and hard texture, not only helps hamsters grind their teeth effectively but also adds fun to chewing. The apple sticks, timothy sticks, flower grass sticks, and flower grass cookies offer a more natural way for guinea pigs to gnaw and chew with their pleasant natural aromas.

【Natural Materials】Our guinea pig chew toys set uses natural materials, committed to providing bunnies with a safe and healthy chewing solution. Each rat chew toys is carefully selected from nature's bounty, ensuring no harmful substances or additives are used in the production process. We firmly believe that only the purest, most natural materials can bring pets the purest health and happiness.

【Maintaining Oral Health】The sweet bamboo sticks for rabbits, apple sticks for rabbits, timothy grass sticks, and other items in this bunny chew toys set have moderate hardness and toughness, providing enough resistance during chewing to effectively wear down overgrown teeth. The chinchilla chew toys have a medium roughness that can clean teeth without causing damage. Additionally, they help strengthen the chewing muscles of bunnies, enhancing their chewing ability. Regular use of these guinea pig chews products can prevent bunnies from chewing on the cage out of boredom or anxiety.

【Sealed Design】The jar containing this rabbit chew toys is equipped with a durable seal at the opening, providing excellent airtightness and effectively extending the shelf life of the toys. The jar and lid are precisely threaded to ensure a tight seal when the lid is screwed on, preventing air and moisture from entering even when the toys are not in use. This also helps to extend the shelf life of the guinea pig chew toys for teeth.

【Rabbit Gift】This rabbit chew sticks set is specially designed for small pets like rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters, and chinchillas. It not only satisfies their natural need to chew but also makes an ideal gift for pet owners. The set includes a variety of chew toys made from natural materials, offering a rich assortment and ample quantity to ensure pets can enjoy chewing for a long time. Keep your small pets away from the cage and your furniture!
